question:
Consider the following statements about the Wholesale Price Index in India:
  1. The base year for the calculation of Wholesale Price Index is 2011-12
  2. The Food Index in the Wholesale price Index is made of both unprocessed and processed food items.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Both are correct statements. The new series of Wholesale Price Index (WPI) with base 2011-12 is effective from April 2017. A new “Food Index” is being compiled combining the “Food Articles” under “Primary Articles” and “Food Products” under “Manufactured Products”. {Reference}
